column4: Hello!  How come after upgrading to Drake from Breezy I get a random lockup at bootup right before the login screen?  Cursor underscore in upper left hand corner of screen will flash a few times then freeze.  NEVER did this is Breezy, what's the deal?
what happens when you press alt+ctrl+F1 ?
Tried pressing alt-ctrl-f1 with no luck!
okay. what video card does the system have? also, what method did you use to upgrade?
